subject: "It's Alive!"
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, Thank-you SOoooo much for more info. on how to get it to work = scan! I turned it back on, and listening with the sterio ear-buds, (crossing fingers, too), I slowly pressed the up button and wham! it went from C2C radio station into scan mode, then when I pressed the button again, it went back to being a radio! AWESOME!!!  Can't wait to try it out (tomorrow!). I really, really did NOT want to take the damn thing apart again! <[8-))  =Judy=
